hero.tagline: The gods have fallen. The sky is torn.
hero.subtitle: Choose your race. Claim your dominion.

features.title: A New Era of War
features.subtitle: Skyrend reimagines Lineage 2 as an all-out Race vs Race battlefield. Every race stands alone. Every territory must be conquered.

rvr.title: Race vs Race
rvr.desc: Four factions wage open war across the continent. No allies outside your blood — only enemies.

territory.title: Territory Control
territory.desc: Capture outposts and strongholds to unlock new regions. No teleports — earn every step forward.

classes.title: Unique Classes
classes.desc: Each race wields its own healers, tanks, mages, archers and assassins. Fully self-sufficient.

sieges.title: Epic Sieges
sieges.desc: Massive faction-scale castle sieges determine who controls the most coveted territories.

archons.title: Archons & Leaders
archons.desc: Player-elected race leaders command armies and shape the fate of their people.

talents.title: Talent System
talents.desc: Deep character customization beyond your class. Forge a build that is uniquely yours.

factions.title: Choose Your Path
factions.subtitle: When the sky shattered and the gods vanished, the races of Aden were left to forge their own destiny. Four factions now vie for supremacy.

dominion.name: Dominion
dominion.lore: With the gods silent, humanity refused to kneel. United under the banner of Dominion, they forge their destiny through steel, faith, and unyielding ambition. Their legions march not for divine favor — but for absolute sovereignty.

accord.name: Accord
accord.lore: Masters of craft and commerce, the Dwarves banded together under the Accord — a pact sworn in molten iron. What they lack in stature, they forge in firepower. Their war machines reshape the battlefield.

veil.name: Veil
veil.lore: Once divided by light and shadow, the Elves united behind the Veil when their patron gods fell silent. Ancient magic and moonlit blades now serve a single purpose — survival through unity.

covenant.name: Covenant
covenant.lore: The Covenant needs no gods. Bound by blood oaths and primal fury, the Orcs saw the Skyrend as liberation. No chains. No masters. Only the strongest will rule the shattered world.

guides.title: Prepare for Battle
guides.subtitle: Learn the ways of war before stepping onto the battlefield.

footer.disclaimer: Skyrend is a fan-made project. Lineage 2 is a registered trademark of NCSOFT Corporation.

download_page.subtitle: Get the client and join the war. Choose your preferred download method.

requirements.cpu: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
